text.more:
> Hover on a node to see its connections (visible nodes), rest of the map will get hidden.  
> Node Color signifies the openness of the node(yak) for receiving DMs (green: DMs open for collaboration opportunities; yellow: DMs open for starting conversation; blue: prefer to not receive unsolicited DMs)
> Thick edge signifies multiple shared-interests between those nodes.
> Learn more about this project in the #yak-network-map channel on the Yak Collective Discord Server.
text.intro: Yak Network Map displays shared domain-interests among active yaks, to encourage new 1:1 connections.
text.title: Yak Network Map
